item.description:
Every Saturday this Summer, bring a beach chair or blanket for the beach and enjoy free live outdoor concerts performed by popular regional and nationally recognized bands such as the James Montgomery Band, The Bruce Marshall Band, The Fools, and Ernie & the Automatics, followed by a spectacular fireworks display!

I will update this as the date gets closer, then we will know who we will see at the concert.

UPDATE: 7/4/09 I just got an email update as to who will be playing on which days! We will be seeing Chad Perrone he sings a variety of Folk Rock/Pop/Rock music singles, let's go cheer him on!!

Remember to bring your lawn chair or a blanket to sit on. Also if you want to bring any snacks maybe we can all bring some and have a mini picnic. If you do just bring something on the light side, easy to eat and share. Just a thought you don't have to bring anything if you don't want to.

I will send another update later this week advising an update as to where we will meet!

7/10/09 UPDATE: Hey everyone I hope it's not a problem but I have changed the meetup time for this event, the concert starts at 7:00 so I thought maybe we could get there a little earlier to get a good spot on the beach! If you are not able to make it at that time please send me an email and I will give you my cell phone # for us to meetup! Also I have changed the meeting place for this event!


Looking forward to sitting back and relaxing listening to some tunes!

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be outside of Salisbury Discount!
item.name: Surfside Live! Concert Series and Fireworks
